title._content: [Unidentified young soldier in Confederate uniform and slouch hat with plume] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified young soldier in Confederate uniform and slouch hat with plume] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.6 x 8.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 3-159. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Purchased from: David Parks' Military Antiques, Utica, Michigan, 2002. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
